content:
MK-1585
August 3, 1962
Mr. W. K. Ku Chief Engineer Shihmen Development Commission Shihmen Camp Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment - Catalogue No. 4
Dear Mr. Ku:
We learn from Mr. Carter, AID/T that the following equipment is available which we recommend be procurred through the regular channels.
GSA 28330 NP-13811-62-131, LATHE: 3411, vertical, turret, drive, belt, table dia. 24", cap. 24" swing, Mfgr. Bullard Co. , Ser. 21970, yr. 12, 220, 225 or 230V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc.
GSA 28145 NP-13807-62-131, DRILLING MACHINE: 3413, radial, plain, electric motor gear driven, cap. 31 arm, 9" column, Mfr. Cincinnati Gilbert Mach. Tool Co., Ser. 5141, yr. 42, 220/440V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc.
GSA 28146 NP-13712-62-131, DRILLING MACHINE: 3413, radial, plain, cap. 3' arm, 9" column, drive, gear, Mfr. Morris Mach. Tool Co., yr. 40, Ser. C-306, 220/440V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc., access: (1) tbl. size 27" 1g., 27" w, 30" h.
GSA 28147 NP-13713-62-131, DRILLING MACHINE: 3413, radial, plain, cap. 3' arm, 9" column, drive: gear, access: (1) tbl. size 27" 1g., 27" w, 30" h, Mfr. Morris Mach. Tool Co., Ser. C-305, yr. 41, 220/440V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc.
GSA 28434 NP-402-62-265, HACK SAW: 3419, cap. 10" x 10", hydraulic feed, 3 speed, sliding gear, Mfr. Racine Hydraulics & Machinery, Inc., 220, 225 or 230V AC, 3 PH, 60 cyc.
Please return the attached GSA catalogue to Mr. Carter, AID/T after it has served your purpose.
Very truly yours, MORRISON-KNUDSEN OF ASIA, INC. Stein Johna Glenn C. Johnson Project Manager
Encls. ce: Dam Construction Dept. J. B. Carter, AID/T
29th L
Adadentia Historien
GCJ/rw
49

Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment - Catalogue No. 4
We learn from Mr. Carter, AID/T that the following equipment is available which we recommend be procurred through the regular channels.
GSA 28330 NP-13811-62-131, LATHE: 3411, vertical, turret, drive, belt, table dia. 24", cap. 24" swing, Mfgr. Bullard Co. , Ser. 21970, yr. 12, 220, 225 or 230V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc.

GSA 28145 NP-13807-62-131, DRILLING MACHINE: 3413, radial, plain, electric motor gear driven, cap. 31 arm, 9" column, Mfr. Cincinnati Gilbert Mach. Tool Co., Ser. 5141, yr. 42, 220/440V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc.

GSA 28146 NP-13712-62-131, DRILLING MACHINE: 3413, radial, plain, cap. 3' arm, 9" column, drive, gear, Mfr. Morris Mach. Tool Co., yr. 40, Ser. C-306, 220/440V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc., access: (1) tbl. size 27" 1g., 27" w, 30" h.

GSA 28147 NP-13713-62-131, DRILLING MACHINE: 3413, radial, plain, cap. 3' arm, 9" column, drive: gear, access: (1) tbl. size 27" 1g., 27" w, 30" h, Mfr. Morris Mach. Tool Co., Ser. C-305, yr. 41, 220/440V AC, 3 phase, 60 cyc.

Please return the attached GSA catalogue to Mr. Carter, AID/T after it has served your purpose.
Very truly yours, MORRISON-KNUDSEN OF ASIA, INC. Stein Johna Glenn C. Johnson Project Manager
